statements: SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty, contact_number FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialty != 'Pediatrics';
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology'
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id=1
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Orthopedics' ORDER BY doctor_name DESC
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_doctors FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Pediatrics'
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients WHERE doctor_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients WHERE doctor_id = 2 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, specialty FROM Patients JOIN Doctors ON Patients.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty, hospital_id FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_id FROM doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology' OR specialty='Neurology';
SELECT treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_id, COUNT(doctor_id) AS doctor_count FROM doctors GROUP BY hospital_id HAVING COUNT(doctor_id) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, birthdate FROM Patients ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, birthdate FROM Patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, Patients.name AS patient_name, Doctors.name AS doctor_name FROM Appointments JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, birthdate FROM Patients ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, p.name AS patient_name FROM Doctors d JOIN Patients p ON d.doctor_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT t.treatment_description, p.name AS patient_name, t.treatment_date FROM Treatments t JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE t.treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.specialty, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Doctors d LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.specialty ORDER BY appointment_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_id, patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, Patients.patient_name FROM Treatments JOIN Patients ON Treatments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;

SELECT appointment_date, Doctors.doctor_name, Patients.patient_name FROM Appointments JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date, progress_notes, next_steps FROM Appointments JOIN Progress ON Appointments.appointment_id = Progress.appointment_id;
